Package javax.media.jai.registry

Class Summary
CIFRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for CollectionImageFactory objects.
CollectionRegistryMode A class that provides information about the "rendered" registry (operation) mode.
CRIFRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for ContextualRenderedImageFactory objects.
RCIFRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for RenderableCollectionImageFactory objects.
RemoteCRIFRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for RemoteCRIF objects.
RemoteRenderableRegistryMode A class which provides information about the "remoteRenderable" registry mode.
RemoteRenderedRegistryMode A class which provides information about the "remoteRendered" registry mode.
RemoteRIFRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for RemoteRIF objects.
RenderableCollectionRegistryMode A class that provides information about the "renderableCollection" registry (operation) mode.
RenderableRegistryMode A class that provides information about the "renderable" registry (operation) mode.
RenderedRegistryMode A class that provides information about the "rendered" registry (operation) mode.
RIFRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for RenderedImageFactory objects.
TileDecoderRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for TileDecoderFactory objects.
TileDecoderRegistryMode A class which provides information about the "tileDecoder" registry mode.
TileEncoderRegistry Utility class to provide type-safe interaction with the OperationRegistry for TileEncoderFactory objects.
TileEncoderRegistryMode A class which provides information about the "tileEncoder" registry mode.
